Posts.Content: I had my Bilateral skin saving surgery on 7/30/2010, I of course have pain, but the most concerning to me is the tightness I have on my chest as if I were having muscle spasms...I also have expanders as part of the reconstruction.  I'm wondering if the expanders are causing this tightness, if so, and it does not go away, I'm considering removing the expanders...and now I have been reading the this message board of same experiences, except my is not so much pain it is very discomforting almost to the point I want at that moment to ripped them off..of course I can't..but I feel already desperate...is this normal does it get better?  Do all patients encounters this problem?   No one ever said when I did research about what now I have been reading....please help   Marty
Posts.Title: Bilateral Post Mastectomy with Reconstruction

Posts.Content: I had Bilateral Double Mastectomy w/o Reconstruction on 7/30/2010 & another on 8/23/2010 to remove dead skin, wherein I opted to have expanders removed...since then I do suffer from tightness of chest w/o pain...My concern now is when I was reading some of the blogs in the earlier months..some had describe an uncontrollably itching..Since I have been having this itchiness recently and has been over a month..I looked up this info...and was brought out enlarged lymph nodes can cause itchiness, though my lymph nodes were not removed...could this be a problem???   Have any of you had this post trauma problem? I will be seeing my primary doctor, tomorrow, but would like feedback from you all...Would most appreciate this very much....Thank you and I do hope, you are doing well, as can be...my prayers are with you all....Marty
Posts.Title: Itchy Skin All Over Body
